channel.title: Wtf is wrong with my mouse?
channel.description: Everytime i want to open something, or go to a webpage it doesn't click! Like if i wanted to open up a folder in my hard drive, sometimes you would just have to click it twice(Normal way) but sometimes i hv to click it like 6 to 7 times for it to open, its not slowness of the computer. Just the mouse, i don't think it could be dirty inside, because that only affects the movement of the mouse on the window, not the actual clicking? I downloaded updates, patches for the mouse, still no luck? Anyone got anything in mind to fix it?

item.title: Wtf is wrong with my mouse?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Didn’t help. In Halo i still shoot super slow with the pistol, and i’m clicking super fast, and as for folder stuff, when i highlight it doesn’t highlight, folder won’t open, etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Wtf is wrong with my mouse?

item.title: Wtf is wrong with my mouse?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Go to the options for the mouse on the computer, there you can choose how fast you must double-click to get it work.

Read full topic
item.source: Wtf is wrong with my mouse?

item.title: Wtf is wrong with my mouse?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

If i click softer, it doesn’t even open up lol. I just tried with the start button, i just clicked it 5 times, still won’t open(softly). Clicking it hard, actually makes it open, but most of the time it doesn’t, its better than soft clicking though.

Read full topic
item.source: Wtf is wrong with my mouse?

item.title: Wtf is wrong with my mouse?
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

If the other mouse only had sensitivity issues, which is obviously down to the DPI and what you are used too. So clicking was fine then it’s probably just that mouse? (Maybe clicking too hard? xD)

Read full topic
item.source: Wtf is wrong with my mouse?

item.title: Wtf is wrong with my mouse?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“Gotta Catch Them All, post:7, topic:160006”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=217798.msg1894393#msg1894393 date=1195870659]
EDIT2: Just found out the computer is only 1 year old, not 2 or 3.
[/quote]

1 year, it brought it all together, got it from dell.

No, Greeny meant how old was your mouse.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Wtf is wrong with my mouse?

item.title: Wtf is wrong with my mouse?
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

Java Is My Bitch™:

EDIT2: Just found out the computer is only 1 year old, not 2 or 3.

item.source: Wtf is wrong with my mouse?

item.title: Wtf is wrong with my mouse?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Greeny:

If it’s a cheap mouse, just consider replacing it. I imagine it’s the internal mechanisms that are faulty and worn down.

Its dell, probably the mouse yeah. let me try with my sisters mouse, if it works better.

EDIT: Its actually worse, i really need the mouse to play Halo online, now the mouse is over sensitive, i tried to fix the sensitivity, but still. Now i can’t snipe people.

EDIT2: Just found out the computer is only 1 year old, not 2 or 3.

Read full topic
item.source: Wtf is wrong with my mouse?

item.title: Wtf is wrong with my mouse?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Greeny:

How long have you had it? Most mice have like a click threshold and wear down after so many million clicks.

About 3 or 2 years.

.Flair:

If it’s wireless you need to replace the batteries or charge it or what ever

It’s not wireless, usb mouse.

Read full topic
